name: Space Delivery Man
description:
Congratulations, our new employee!

Today you have a very important mission. You need to deliver the synergy to the planet Azuria. This is a very important mission

Be careful, because PSD-131205 anomaly will be on your way. Rumor has it that some terrifying monster lives there, so avoid it.

If you are lucky enough to get into such a mess that the whole synergy will fall into an anomaly, then you have some advice below:

1. Do not catch the monster's eyes

2. Control the amount of oxygen

3. Collect all synergy and return home

That's all, have a nice trip!
